name: Awesome post! I'd love to see some of your suggestions implemented within Together, specifically on the graph-based side. I continue to believe that the most critical problem to solve to drive Indieweb adoption is a unified experience for reading, interacting, and publishing. Pull requests are welcome! We definitely need more smart people working on Together :)

content.html: Awesome post! I'd love to see some of your suggestions implemented within Together, specifically on the graph-based side. I continue to believe that the most critical problem to solve to drive Indieweb adoption is a unified experience for reading, interacting, and publishing. Pull requests are welcome! We definitely need more smart people working on Together :)
content.value: Awesome post! I'd love to see some of your suggestions implemented within Together, specifically on the graph-based side. I continue to believe that the most critical problem to solve to drive Indieweb adoption is a unified experience for reading, interacting, and publishing. Pull requests are welcome! We definitely need more smart people working on Together :)
